title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.10 - Whistle signals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.10 - Whistle signals

State Regulations

Whistle signals used by the commission's employees shall have
the following meanings: One blast: All moving traffic shall stop. Two blasts: Traffic shall proceed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
654.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
